name: Lightning Strike Dash
description:
Watch Gameplay VIDEO

A rhythm-action game that has you careening around over 50 electric race tracks at high speeds trying to score points by matching your ships color to the different colored elemental gems and barriers. To score big points you'll need to steer cleanly and up your multiplier.

Multiple play modes, lots of ships, upgrades, tons of levels, it's a lightning strike deal!

  • Screen Resolution: 1280x720
  • Windows 7 and XP
